version_description:
Thanks for using Waze, where 80 million drivers outsmart traffic with real-time road information. Waze is constantly improving, so check out what's new this version:
- Just tap and drive: The search bar is right on the map, so with a tap you can find a destination and start your navigation.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

You’re one of 85 million Wazers outsmarting traffic with real-time updates. See what’s new:

- There’s a brand new Waze voice… and it’s yours! Record your own voice directions to guide you on the road
- Easily share your voice directions with friends and family
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- There’s a brand new Waze voice… and it’s yours! Record your own voice directions to guide you on the road

Thanks for using Waze! With every drive, you’re joining 85 million Wazers who save time by taking the fastest route. Here is what’s new:
- Flat tire? Request roadside help so Wazers around you can stop and lend a hand
- Find out if a business is open or closed before you start driving
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

Thanks for using Waze! With every drive, you’re joining 90 million Wazers who save time by taking the fastest route. Here is what’s new:
- Updates to share ETA: It’s now easier to share your arrival time and have friends see your progress on the map
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

There are a bunch of new features in this update! See what’s included:
- It’s here! Waze now supports routing for motorcycles. Update your vehicle type and hit the road.
- Waze is now optimized for iPhone X.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.
